name: CMFallDetectionDelegate
desc: A delegate that receives information about fall detection events and authorization status changes.

items.name: func fallDetectionManager(CMFallDetectionManager, didDetect: CMFallDetectionEvent, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Indicates a fall detection event occurred.

items.name: func fallDetectionManagerDidChangeAuthorization(CMFallDetectionManager)
items.desc: Indicates the fall detection authorization status changed.
